description:
Twitter Wallpaper is the easiest, most convenient way to keep up with all things Twitter.  It runs in the background and writes the latest tweets and trends right onto your wallpaper.

Never again will you have to tap an app icon, wait for it to load, then wait for it to contact Twitter and update itself.   Using Twitter Wallpaper, simply look at your phone and the latest tweets and trends are right there in front of you.

Load all your contacts tweets, just the tweets from a customized list, or show the latest Twitter Trends.  Customize the colors of the font and the update schedule.  It couldn't be easier.

--------------
v1.0.2 updates Twitter Wallpaper to use Twitter's new way of authenticating user accounts.
